Hey, guys... I know that you're able to play Quest games online on the iPhone, but the thing I want to know is if you're able to play it offline, like on an app or something? If not, thanks for helping anyway.

It'd be cool to play offline so I can play anywhere!

Posts.EditableText:
It would be possible to create an app using MonoTouch that would allow this. But current Apple App Store policies mean that the app would not be approved, as they prohibit apps from running arbitrary code, which is what a Quest interpreter would do.

One way around this would be to package individual games, or a group of games, as one application. It's something I'm certainly interested in looking at, but it's not likely to happen for quite a while.
